title: Bowl, ca. 1800–10
provenance: W.G.T. Burne, London, (7-8-71) purchased by WPW.
description: Spherical bowl with wide flaring rim. Stem with flattened knop and steppedcircular base. Top rim has scalloped edge and row of cut blazes. Bowl hasband of ovals containing shallow cut diamonds, each with 9 smaller diamondsinside; row of facets cutting-above, prismatic rings below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, ca. 1800–10.
ca. 1800–10. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-226.
